intro: The Flames of Damnation burn on your path – are you ready to face them?
description:
Dive into a relentless adrenaline-pumping action game with Flames of Damnation, where classic 90s shooter elements collide with modern mechanics! Inspired by legendary titles of the genre, this game offers a challenge you won’t forget.

Key Features:
	•	Fast-Paced Gameplay: Master lightning-fast strafe-jumping to dodge attacks, navigate tricky terrain, and dominate your enemies.
	•	Unique Arsenal: Discover powerful infernal weapons, each with distinct characteristics tailored to different playstyles.
	•	Exploration and Upgrades: Find keys to unlock hidden areas filled with upgrades, magical spheres, and secret opportunities.
	•	Hellish Environments: Battle hordes of demonic creatures in richly detailed, dark, and dangerous settings that immerse you in the depths of hell.
	•	Unforgiving Challenges: Every encounter demands strategy and quick reflexes as enemies grow stronger and more cunning.

Flames of Damnation is a true homage to classic shooters, designed for those who crave tough battles and intense gameplay. Face the depths of hell and prove you’re worthy of survival!
